displaytitle: Madonna and Child with St. Dominic

creditline: Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895

texts.textentryhtml:
Handwritten note: "Purchased by Platt from Richeton, London. 1922";

 Mahon: ca. 1616-1618.;

displaymaker: Guercino (Giovanni Francesco Barbieri), 1591–1666; born Cento, Italy; died Bologna, Italy
caption: Guercino (Giovanni Francesco Barbieri) (1591–1666, born Cento, Italy; died Bologna, Italy), Madonna and Child with St. Dominic, ca. 1616–17. Pen and brown ink and brush and brown and gray-brown wash, on beige laid paper; 24.2 × 16.8 cm, 53 × 40.3 × 3.2 cm (frame). Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895 (x1948-1267)
